hanzi-su-wiki:
妹

Значения

Младшая сестра

Мнемоника

  • Младшая сестра — девушка 女, которая пока ещё не 未 замужем.

  • Девушка 女 и дерево, которое ещё не 未 выросло. Это означает «младшая сестра».

purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 未 indicates the sound; 女 (woman) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
姐妹 [ jiě mèi ]: sisters; siblings; sister (school, city etc)
姊妹 [ zǐ mèi ]: (older and younger) sisters; sister (school, city etc)
表妹 [ biǎo mèi ]: younger female cousin via female line
兄妹 [ xiōng mèi ]: brother(s) and sister(s)
弟妹 [ dì mèi ]: younger sibling; younger brother's wife
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 女 [ nǚ ] woman, girl; female
    • 未 [ wèi ] not yet; 8th terrestrial branch
heisig_chinese_memo: My younger sister is NOT YET a fully grown WOMAN.
heisig_constituent: younger sister, woman, not yet, one, tree, wood
heisig_story: The younger sister in the family is the woman in the family who, like the newest branch in a tree, is not yet old enough or mature enough to do everything the elder sister can do (See frame 442).
koohiiStory1: My younger sister is NOT YET a fully grown WOMAN.
koohiiStory2: Is your younger sister a woman? Not yet! Damn!
jp_example_words:
姉妹(きょうだい): sisters
従姉妹(いとこ): female cousin
姉妹(しまい): sisters
妹(いもうと): younger sister
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Who's that woman pretending to be a jet? That's my younger sister. *Sigh*
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine a little girl (your younger sister) running around with her arms out, pretending to be a jet, too. Prwoooooo!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your younger sister is giving some mice (まい) a ride on her back like a jet.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Ew, gross. Your younger sister is such a weirdo! Why does she have mice on her back while pretending to be a jet?

humanum_full_description_en:
Jiajin inscriptions start with the sound of " female " and " wei ". Oracle bone inscriptions are often pronounced as " wei ", which means ambiguity, that is, the time before Tianjiang Mingming. Bronze expressed sister, Nvdi, Songgong䜌basket used in state worship: "There Yin Tian Yi Tang Sun Songgong䜌first glance (as) that Yu Lady sister sentences Hideko Maid Accompanying 𠤳 (basket used in state worship)." And pretended to " ignorant " Tai Yue Ding: "Female (Ru) "Meichen also (has) a big service", "Meichen" is equivalent to "Mishuang" (see Qiangyunkai), referring to dawn. "Shuowen": "[I] is cool, Dan Ming."

" Sister " often means " girl brother ". "Shuowen": "The girl's brother also. From the female, not yet." "Poetry·Weifeng·Shuoren": "Sister of Donggong, aunt of Xinghou."

" Sister " also means a girl. "Yi‧ Guimei": "Guimei. There is no profit to levy fierceness." Wang Bi's note: "Sister is also called a girl."
humanum_short_description_en: Jia Jin inscription starts with the sound of " female " and " wei ". Oracle bone inscriptions are often pronounced as " mei ", which means before dawn; inscriptions on bones and inscriptions mean sister and girl brother, and pretend to be " mei "
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「女」，「未」聲，甲骨文多讀作「昧」，表示昧爽，即天將明之前的時間。金文表示妹妹、女弟，宋公䜌簠：「有殷天乙唐孫宋公䜌乍(作)其妹句敔夫人季子媵𠤳(簠)。」又假作「昧」，大盂鼎：「女(汝)妹辰又(有)大服」，「妹辰」相當於「昧爽」(參強運開)，指黎明時分。《說文》：「[昧]爽，旦明也。」

　　「妹」後常表示女弟。《說文》：「女弟也。从女，未聲。」《詩‧衛風‧碩人》：「東宮之妹，刑侯之姨。」毛傳：「女子後生曰妹。」

　　「妹」也表示少女。《易‧歸妹》：「歸妹。征凶，無攸利。」王弼注：「妹者，少女之稱也。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「女」，「未」聲，甲骨文多讀作「昧」，表示天明之前；金文表示妹妹、女弟，又假作「昧」。

And pretended to " ignorant" Tai Yue Ding: "Female (Ru) "Meichen also (has) a big service", "Meichen" is equivalent to "Mishuang" (see Qiangyunkai), referring to dawn. "Shuowen": "[I] is cool, Dan Ming." " Sister" often means " girl brother". "Shuowen": "The girl's brother also. From the female, not yet." "Poetry·Weifeng·Shuoren": "Sister of Donggong, aunt of Xinghou." " Sister" also means a girl. "Yi‧ Guimei": "Guimei. There is no profit to levy fierceness." 妹字的基本解释

妹
mèi
称同父母（或只同父、只同母）而比自己年纪小的女子：妹妹。兄妹。弟妹（a.弟弟和妹妹的合称；b.俗称弟妇）。妹夫。
对比自己年纪小的同辈女性的称呼：表妹。师妹。世妹。
姊姐

妹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mèi］
［《廣韻》莫佩切，去隊，明。］
(1)妹妹。
(2)少女，女子。
(3)女子对同辈的谦称。
(4)通“昧”。蔑弃。

妹字的英文翻译

◎ 妹
young sister, sister

妹字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　妹； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页257第28
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫佩切，音昧。【說文】女弟也。【詩·大雅】俔天之妹。【衞風】東宮之妹。　又同母異父曰外妹。【左傳·成十一年】聲伯嫁其外妹于施孝叔。　又【易·說卦】上震下兌，歸妹。【雜卦】歸妹，女之終也。　又【集韻】莫貝切，音眛。義同。　又地名。【書·酒誥】明大命于妹邦。　又國名。【汲冢周書】姑妹珍。【註】姑妹國，後屬越。

妹字的源字形

妹字的起名意思

：用以称呼非同父母的年轻女性。

sister
Basic explanation of words
sister
mèi
Said the same parents (or only the same father, only the same mother) and younger than her own girl: sister. Brother and sister. Siblings (a. collectively called younger brother and sister; b. commonly known as siblings). Brother-in-law.
Contrast yourself with the names of younger women of your generation: cousin. Junior sister. Shimei.
Sister
sister

[①]［mèi］
["Guangyun" Mo Peche, go to the team, Ming. ]
(1) Sister.
(2) Girls, women.
(3) A woman's modest name for her peers.
(4) Through "Ambiguous". Contempt.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　妹; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 257 28
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Mo Peiqie, the sound is ambiguous. [Said the text] Girl brother too. 【Poetry·Daya】Sister of Li Tian. 【Wei Feng】Sister of Donggong.　A half-father called a sister again. [Zuo Zhuan·Eleventh Year] Shengbo married his sister Yu Shi Xiaoshu.　[Yi·Said Gua] up and down, return to sister. 【Miscellaneous Gua】Guimei, the end of the female.　[Jiyun] Mo Beiqie, Yin Ying. The same meaning.　Also place name. 【Book·Liquor】Ming was appointed to the sister state.　 Also the name of the country. 【Jizhong Zhoushu】Auntie Zhen. [Note] The country of sister-in-law, later belongs to Yue.

Сестра мэй
сестра
сестра
«Сказал Вэнь»: «Сестра, младший брат молчит». Первоначальное значение - «женщина с теми же родителями, но моложе ее».
«Книга песен»: «Сестра Дунгонг, тетя Нахоу». В более широком смысле, это слово относится к «девушке».
«Гуймэй» в Книге Перемен.
Примечание Ван Би: «Сестру еще называют девушкой».

妹

Значения

Младшая сестра

Мнемоника

  • Младшая сестра — девушка 女, которая пока ещё не 未 замужем.

  • Девушка 女 и дерево, которое ещё не 未 выросло. Это означает «младшая сестра».
Radicals: 女, 未  (woman, jet)
Meaning Mnemonic
Who's that woman pretending to be a jet? That's my younger sister. *Sigh*
Imagine a little girl (your younger sister) running around with her arms out, pretending to be a jet, too. Prwoooooo!
Reading Mnemonic
